instruction: Explain why these two stories have a different tone.
input:
Story 1: An enterprising young man made it big in the business world.

Story 2: An ambitious youngster rose to the top of the corporate ladder.
output: Story 1 has a more positive tone, as it emphasizes the man’s enterprising qualities and implies that his success was due to his ambition. Story 2, however, has a more neutral tone, simply noting that the youngster rose to the top but not ascribing any particular qualities to him.
